action.action-desc: Mr. Sam Johnson of Texas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the IRS Oversight Board.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Eliminate Failed IRS Oversight Board Act.

subsection.text: Subchapter A of chapter 80 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking section 7802 (and by striking the item relating to such section in the table of sections of such subchapter).
